Package com.enjin.sdk.services.notification

Class PusherNotificationService

java.lang.Object
com.enjin.sdk.services.notification.PusherNotificationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotificationsService
public class PusherNotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements NotificationsService
Implementation class of NotificationsService for Pusher events.
See Also:
NotificationsService, PusherEvent, PusherEventListener
